thread.title: This Video of Madonna's New Twins Singing "Twinkle Twinkle Little Star" Is So Sweet
thread.title_full: This Video of Madonna's New Twins Singing "Twinkle Twinkle Little Star" Is So Sweet

author: maressabrown
title: This Video of Madonna's New Twins Singing "Twinkle Twinkle Little Star" Is So Sweet
text:
This Video of Madonna's New Twins Singing "Twinkle Twinkle Little Star" Is So Sweet This Video of Madonna's New Twins Singing "Twinkle Twinkle Little Star" Is So Sweet 
The singer posted the clip of her recently adopted 4-year-old twin girls, Stella and Estere, to Instagram. By Maressa Brown Comments 
Ben Stansall/Getty Images Looks like Madonna has more than one "Lucky Star" these days. The pop star, who recently adopted 4-year-old twins Estere and Stella from Malawi, took to Instagram yesterday to share an adorable video of her new daughters singing . Wearing matching striped PJs and socks with polka dots, the girls have piano accompaniment to their rendition, which Madonna proudly captioned, "A little night Music ,,🌟⭐️🌟⭐️🌟⭐️😂💘🌸🙏🏻." 
Here's the heartwarming clip, which has racked up more than 418K views in just 14 hours. A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 18, 2017 at 5:50pm PST 
It's the first video of the twins Madonna has shared since the adoption was official earlier this month. As she initially asked for "privacy during this transitional time," it's wonderful that she now feels comfortable sharing this special family moment with the world. A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 8, 2017 at 10:24am PST Want the latest parenting news? Sign up for our Parents Daily newsletter 
Prior to adopting her twins , Madonna, 58, was already mom to four children: Lourdes Leon, 20, Rocco Ritchie, 16, David Banda, 11, and Mercy James, 11. She's been devoted to the cause of battling poverty among Malawi's orpaned children since founding her charity Raising Malawi in 2006. So happy for Madonna and her beautiful family of seven!
